body:
Shalom community!

I've made some fun remixes on Community Slack, and I want to hear some of yours!

Please put the song name / author next to remix, don't remix the whole song / only remix a stanza or 2, and please don't get triggered if the remix is about you (but at the same time, the composer should'nt bully the person.) MUST BE AVICUS RELATED.

Happy composing!

~EDJM9

My Remixes!

Last Christmas, Steven gave Liz his heart, but the very next day, she gave it away. This year, to save him from tears, he quit the server.(Last Christmas)

I, O I, O I, ALM's drunk and Dagger's high, so high, so higghhhh.(Hymn For The Weekend, ColdPlay)

title: Avicus Remixes (Banter)

replies.body:
You better watch out
You better cry now
Better report
I'm telling you why
Hacker is coming to town

He's flying around
And killing at spawn
Gonna find out Where does mod hide
Hacker is coming to town
He sees you when you're sneaking
He knows when you attack
He knows if you've been PvP god
So report him for goodness sake!

replies.body:
I used to stream tourneys
Viewers rised when I gave the word
Now in the morning, I stream alone
Without the rank I used to know

I used to fix my mic
See the rage in my viewers eyes
Listen as dev would sing
My media is dead, Long live the king
Coldplay's viva la vida
